Title: Under-Pier Catwalk
Description:
Tar-sticky beams and rope hairs. The lantern pushes the dark back just enough to regret.

Someone has carved gull sigils into the posts.

Options.Text: Follow the gull sigils toward Shanty Alley.

Exits.Text: Along the slick catwalk to the Old Sea Bell

Paragraphs: Tar-sticky beams and rope hairs. The lantern pushes the dark back just enough to regret.
Someone has carved gull sigils into the posts.
